TopicTitle: Good solar cycle fellow Kerbal Overlords!

Articles.Content:
I actually bought Kerbal Space Program a while back, but haven't done much except sending a few Kerbals to an accidental early grave. Usually in a fiery fashion, like we are all familiar with. (Sorry Bob about the critical existence failure of the parachute...)

But I have finally gotten a few successful(ish) mission under my belt now.

So now I got a one kerbal ship in orbit over the planet Kerbal and a probe and a three kerbal ship in orbit around the sun.

Still struggling on the challenge of landing on the Mun and getting back.

And on a utterly unrelated note: Does anyone have some tip on how to rescue a 3 kerbal ship that is locked in orbit around the sun without any fuel? Also a 1 kerbal rescue over the planet Kerbal.
